text:
Marcelino Gonzalez Vaquero River (13 February 1932 – 25 May 2020) was a Spanish footballer. He played defense for Real Avilés CF from 1947 to 1969. He also played for the national team eleven times during his career. Campanal was born in Gijón, Spain.
Campanal died on 25 May 2020 at a hospital in Avilés, Spain at the age of 88.
